parameters.name: AssistInfo
parameters.description: Help information for the check item.

parameters.name: CheckRule
parameters.description: Definition rule for the custom check item.

parameters.name: CheckShowName
parameters.description: Name of the custom check item.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: Description information of the check item.

parameters.name: InstanceSubType
parameters.description:
Sub-asset type of the cloud product.
> You can call the [ListCloudAssetSchemas](~~ListCloudAssetSchemas~~) API to get this parameter.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description:
Asset type of the cloud product.
> You can call the [ListCloudAssetSchemas](~~ListCloudAssetSchemas~~) API to get this parameter.

parameters.name: RiskLevel
parameters.description:
Risk level of the check item. Values:
- **HIGH**: High risk
- **MEDIUM**: Medium risk
- **LOW**: Low risk

parameters.name: SectionIds
parameters.description: Array of section IDs associated with the check item.

parameters.name: Solution
parameters.description: Solution information for the check item.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Status of the check item. Values:
- **EDIT**: In editing
- **RELEASE**: Released

> - Changing from **Released** to **In editing** will clear all historical records
> - Only the **Released** status allows the use of the check item for inspection.

parameters.name: Vendor
parameters.description:
Cloud asset vendor.
> You can call the [ListCloudAssetSchemas](~~ListCloudAssetSchemas~~) API to get the available vendors.
